text: illeogalodoe naega hananim oee nuguege simpan-eul guhagessneunyo neohuiege geu seongseoleul bonaesieo myeong baeghi hasin bun-i geubun-isila geu seong seoleul bad-eun geudeul-eun geugeos-i geudaeui junim-eulobuteo gyesidoen jinliim-eul algo issnani neohuineun uisimhaneunja gaunde issji malla hayeossnola
